NGCHM is an R package for creating Next-Generation Clustered Heat Maps (NG-CHMs).
NG-CHMs allow for a dynamic exploration of heat map data in a web browser.

Other NG-CHM resources include:

- [NG-CHM Home Page](https://bioinformatics.mdanderson.org/public-software/ngchm/)
- [YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/@nextgenerationclusteredhea9890)
- [NG-CHM GUI Builder](https://build.ngchm.net/NGCHM-web-builder/Select_Matrix.html?v=2.22.0) for creating NG-CHMs without programming


To learn how to create a NG-CHM using this R package, click [Getting Started](articles/create-a-ng-chm.html).
